job_title: Field Service Technician Boston MA Mobility Customer Services

• Execute production operations according to defined procedures and ensure the integrity and quality of our products Ability to operate and maintain laboratory to clean room standards required in the production of Life Science products Process work orders accurately using an ERP system in a timely manner Maintenance of production batch records and good documentation under ISO requirement Accurate tracking of production data, test data and inventory Assembly of 10x consumables and finished goods both manually and using semi-automated packaging equipment Ability to set up and operate packaging pounds and potentially stand or sit for up to 3 hour increments Experience in automation and packaging of Life Science products, Food Packaging products or related field preferred Relevant experience in a production environment working with standard production control tools – ERP, inventory control, and work orders Experience training employees on production processes defined in production batch records and work instructions Experience writing and revising work instructions and production batch records Experienced in communicating and collaborating with production departments Director of
